mixed-citation.article-title: Review of the plant bug tribe Eccritotarsini (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae) of India and Sri Lanka with description of two new genera and six new species

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Similar to
D. lutheri
in coloration but differs from that species in having long antennal segments, particularly segment I 1.1× as long as head width, segment II 1.25× as long as basal width of pronotum.
This species is known only from the lectotype , which is in poor condition and missing the right antenna, metathorax, wings, all legs except left hind one, and abdomen.
